citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:08 AM on 29
November 2023. The inspector rang the doorbell of the facility, called and left a voicemail, and sent a text message to the
licensee. After 30 minutes, the inspector attempted to ring the doorbell once more and then received a message that the
licensee was unavailable.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:08 AM on 29 
November 2023. The inspector rang the doorbell of the facility, called and left a voicemail, and sent a text message to the 
licensee. After 30 minutes, the inspector attempted to ring the doorbell once more and then received a message that the 
licensee was unavailable. 
 
 
End Section
